text: Henryk Baranowski (9 February 1943 - 27 July 2013) was a Polish theatre director and actor. He starred in two episodes of The Decalogue series directed by Krzysztof Kie≈õlowski. Baranowski was born on 9 February 1943 in Tarnopol, Poland (now Ternopil, Ukraine). He studied at the University of Warsaw. His career began in 1969. He retired in 2006. Baranowski died on 27 July 2013 in Warsaw, Poland from an illness, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish voice actors
title: Henryk Baranowski
